title: Mouse left AND right click not working
body: Okay so I was trying to play League tonight and everything worked with up until the matches would start and suddenly my mouse left AND right clicks stopped working, this happened 2 matches in a row and I now have a leaverbuster which is stupid and needs to be lifted because it wasn't my fault, What can I do to fix my mouse issues???

replies.body:
An account won't receive a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) from just one game, and would need a history of leaves.  The best way to recover your standing with the system is by playing without leaving.  Your specific issue could be happening for a few reasons, like hardware.  I suggest swapping your mouse to see if it works to rule out the possibility of your mouse being faulty or broken.  

Your config file may also be corrupt, which can also happen if modifications are attempted.  Resetting your config could get this fixed up:

 **Log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

Hope that helps!
pls help me for right click !

It wasn't just once, it messed up a few times before it gave me the leaverbuster, my mouse works everywhere else in every game other than League, I uninstalled and reinstalled and it is still having issues, I deleted the config folder as you suggested and I am still having issues, I hooked up a seperate mouse and it is still having issues.
